channel.title: Pages on Jonathon Schwartz
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Jonathon Schwartz

item.title: Software
item.author: jonathon.schwartz@anu.edu.au (Jonathon Schwartz)
item.description: The following are some projects I have worked on (some are still works in progress). Checkout my GitHub for all my publically available code. NetworkAttackSimulator A simulated environment for testing AI agents against a Network. rlalgs A small collection of Deep Reinforcement Learning algorithm implementations using TensorFlow 1.12 and 2.0 (in seperate branch). Work in progress.

item.title: Publications
item.author: jonathon.schwartz@anu.edu.au (Jonathon Schwartz)
item.description: POMDP + Information-Decay: Incorporating Defender's Behavior in Autonomous Penetration Testing Jonathon Schwartz, Edwin El-Mahassni, Hanna Kurniawati In: Proceedings of the Thirtieth International Conference on Automated Planning and Scheduling (ICAPS) 2020. Currently under review paper Autonomous Penetration Testing using Reinforcement Learning Jonathon Schwartz Honours thesis, Bachelor of Science with a major in Computer Science, University of Queensland Submitted in November 2018 Supervised by Dr. Hanna Kurniawati thesis | code Diving in a warming world: the thermal sensitivity and plasticity of diving performance in juvenile estuarine crocodiles (Crocodylus porosus)

item.title: About
item.author: jonathon.schwartz@anu.edu.au (Jonathon Schwartz)
item.description: I'm a budding AI researcher living in Australia. Since March, 2019 I have been working as a research engineer in the Robust Decision-making and Learning Lab at the Australian National University. Curriculum Vitae: CV
